Top-3 Scripts: nl2bash_2020: find -maxdepth 1 -type d | sort | while read -r dir; do n=$(find "$dir" | wc -l); let n--; if [ $n -eq 0 ]; then printf "%4d : %s\n" $n "$dir"; fi; done

ul_10481: #!/bin/bash

while IFS= read -r pp; do
  find . -iname "*${pp}*" -print0
done < /path/to/pattern.txt
